title: Onguza Bicycles Goat Gravel Bike Review: Custom. Steel. African.
content:
Miguel walks us through his Onguza Bicycles Goat gravel bike in the latest Race Metal review video. This frame was made in Namibia, Africa, and was custom-tailored to fit Miguel for endurance gravel events. Watch as Miguel walks us through the entire process of getting his first custom-made steel frame.

The post Onguza Bicycles Goat Gravel Bike Review: Custom. Steel. African. appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
